entries.arrival_phase_1: Checking valid locations that we found in the transports logs for the patrol vessel. Stand by.
entries.arrival_phase_2: We have the patrol vessel's location. Intercept the vessel, destroy it, and all that fly with it.
entries.assassinate_success: One of the patrol vessels sent out a distress signal before being destroyed. Nym is aware of your presence.
entries.destroy_escort: Take out all the escort fighters that were with the main target as well.
entries.escort_remaining: pcontrast1 Tactical Computer:pcontrast3 <%DI escort fighters remaining.>
entries.escort_wiped_out: pcontrast1 Tactical Computer:pcontrast3 <Enemy escort fighter eliminated.>
entries.failed_escape: We have lost the patrol vessel from our scans. You let it get away? Who knows when we will get another chance like this. Report this failure to your commander.
entries.quest_location_d: Remain in the Lok system and intercept the Nym Patrol Craft as it patrols the system.
entries.quest_target_d: Intercept and destroy the Nym Patrol Craft as it travels around the Lok system.
entries.split_quest_alert: Nym is sending out his fleet to intercept you. This is a perfect opportunity for us to hit his smuggling fleet. You have to keep his combat fleet busy while we hit the transports and freighters.
entries.title: Lok System: Destroy the Nym Patrol Craft
entries.title_d: Intercept and destroy the Nym Patrol Craft in the Lok system. Thanks to the information we gathered from the smuggler's vessel we have a lock on one of the craft Nym uses to patrol the Lok system. The patrol craft is a perfect target for our retribution on Nym.
